calendar_publish_dav_page_title: This page shows you how to access your calendars from other applications using CalDAV protocol.
calendar_publish_how_explanation_dav_1: Some applications can access all your calendar at once. Such applications include Apple calendar on macOS, Calendar app on your iPhone or iPad, as well as Microsoft Outlook with Caldav Synchronizer add-on. If you have one such application, use the principal URL below to enable access to all your calendars at once. Only the selected calendars will be visible.
calendar_publish_how_explanation_dav_2: If you are using an application which can only access one calendar at a time, such as Thunderbird/Lightning, use the corresponding calendar URL below.
calendar_publish_how_explanation_ics: Publishing your calendar with a public ICS link provides a read-only access to your events. To publish a calendar, activate a corresponding checkbox and use the public link to share your events with other people.
calendar_publish_ics_page_title: Publish your calendar using a public link.
calendar_publish_ok: Your access settings were successfully saved
